cast.overview: Andy moves to New York to work in the fashion industry. Her boss is extremely demanding, cruel and won't let her succeed if she doesn't fit into the high class elegant look of their magazine.
cast.title: The Devil Wears Prada

crew.overview: Andy moves to New York to work in the fashion industry. Her boss is extremely demanding, cruel and won't let her succeed if she doesn't fit into the high class elegant look of their magazine.
crew.title: The Devil Wears Prada

details.biography:
Lauren Weisberger (born March 28, 1977) is an American writer. She is the author of the 2003 bestseller The Devil Wears Prada, a roman à clef of her experience as an assistant to Vogue editor-in-chief Anna Wintour. Weisberger worked as a writer and editor for Vogue and Departures magazines before writing The Devil Wears Prada, which was adapted into a film of the same name in 2006. She has since published seven other novels.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Lauren Weisberger, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Lauren Weisberger
